Description: Papyrus. Demotic letter on the recto of 7+x lines. Verso: one line address.
Curator's comments: Bibliography Martin, C.J. 2016-2017. The Michaelides Demotic Material, Enchoria 35: 1-8.
Published by Bresciani, in: Acme 12, 1959, 181, 184f. The addressee also features in P. München BStB 26. To be re-edited by Wolfgang Wegner.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (46782) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/46782)
